fieldUpdates.description: Updates Fulfilled by Partner to TRUE
fieldUpdates.name: Fulfilled by Partner

fieldUpdates.description: Update forecast category field to Commit for all opportunities, which are in Pending Contract Signature stage or Contract Submitted & In Negotiation stage
fieldUpdates.name: Intl BG Update Forecast Category to Comm

fieldUpdates.description: Update forecast to Upside if Oppty Stage is Proposal Submitted
fieldUpdates.name: Intl BG Update Forecast Category to Upsi
# Times Close Date has Changed Update

fieldUpdates.description: Updates Account Name to D&B Field
fieldUpdates.name: Update Account Name

fieldUpdates.formula:
IF ((ISPICKVAL(Reporting_Geography__c, "Canada")) && Business_Unit__c == 'IBG (Core)' && Contract_Term_Mths__c <= 12 && (ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Customer")), ((Contract_Term_Mths__c * Reoccurring_Revenue_OLI__c) + One_Time_Revenue_OLI__c) ,
IF ((ISPICKVAL(Reporting_Geography__c, "Canada")) && Business_Unit__c == 'IBG (Core)' && Contract_Term_Mths__c >= 12 && (ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Customer")), ((12 - MONTH( Expected_Service_Start_Date__c )) * ( Reoccurring_Revenue_OLI__c)) + One_Time_Revenue_OLI__c,
IF ((ISPICKVAL(Reporting_Geography__c, "Canada")) && Business_Unit__c == 'IBG (Core)' && Contract_Term_Mths__c <= 12 && (ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Customer - Service Renewal")), ((( Contract_Term_Mths__c * Reoccurring_Revenue_OLI__c ) - (Old_Contract_ACV__c)) + One_Time_Revenue_OLI__c),
IF ((ISPICKVAL(Reporting_Geography__c, "Canada")) && Business_Unit__c == 'IBG (Core)' && Contract_Term_Mths__c >= 12 && (ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Customer - Service Renewal")), ( ((12 - MONTH( Expected_Service_Start_Date__c )) * ( Reoccurring_Revenue_OLI__c)) - ((12 - MONTH( Expected_Service_Start_Date__c )) * Old_Contract_ACV__c/12)+ One_Time_Revenue_OLI__c),
IF (Contract_Term_Mths__c >= 12 , ((12 - MONTH( Expected_Service_Start_Date__c )) * (Incremental_ACV__c /12)),
IF (Contract_Term_Mths__c <= (12 - MONTH( Expected_Service_Start_Date__c )), Incremental_ACV__c, 0))))))
fieldUpdates.name: Update In Year Revenue
Update Notify Opp Owner Mgr for Val Prmp
Update Notify Owner for Value Prompter

rules.fullName: Account Name for PS Activity Tracker Object
rules.description: This Workflow will Update Account Name for PS Activity field. This field is used as look up filter in PreSales Engineer Activities Object

rules.fullName: Acknowledge users when Special Bid Reg converted to Opportunity

rules.description: When contract amends some fields will auto populate in the Amended Opportunity
When contract is renewed some fields will auto populate in the renewal opportunity

rules.fullName: CATM_%23 Times Close Date has Changed

rules.description: Once a renewal with an exchange has been completed a task should open for Operations Team to call site and kick start the deployment process
rules.formula: AND ( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c, ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed/Booked"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Classification__c,"IBG (Core)"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Source__c, "Swap/Exchange"), CONTAINS(Geography__c, "UK") )

rules.description: Once a sale has been completed a task should open for Operations team to call and kick start the deployment
rules.formula: AND ( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c, ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed/Booked"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business"), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Classification__c, "IBG (Core)"), CONTAINS(Geography__c,"UK") )

rules.description: Task created for SA to contact site and determine why we lost the site
contract Term always 1 for I-design record type

rules.fullName: CATM_Email NABG Product of MS Opp
rules.formula: AND ( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c, Region__c = "NABG", ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closing"), CONTAINS(Products__c,"Managed Services"), NOT( OR(CONTAINS(Business_Unit__c,"IBG"), CONTAINS(Business_Unit__c,"Retail") ) ) )

rules.fullName: CATM_Email Past Due Opportunity Close Date - Intl BG
rules.description: Email Alert to IBG when Opp Closed date is Past

rules.fullName: CATM_Email Past Due Opportunity Close Date - NABG
rules.description: Email Alert to NABG when Opp Closed date is Past

rules.fullName: CATM_Email alert sent to Sales Admin when IBG Opportunity is approved
rules.description: Email alert sent to Spain's Sales Admin team making them aware that IBG opportunity has been approved by Sales Director and Finance Director
rules.formula: AND( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c, stageisclosedpending__c = True, ISPICKVAL(Admin_Geo__c, "Spain"), Business_Unit__c = "IBG (Core)" )

AND( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c, OLI_Count__c >= 1, Override_Product_Calculations__c = False, ACV_Update_check_box__c = False, OR( ISCHANGED(Contract_Term_Mths__c), ISCHANGED(Reoccurring_Revenue_OLI__c), ISCHANGED(One_Time_Revenue_OLI__c) ) )

AND( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c, OLI_Count__c >= 1, Override_Product_Calculations__c = false, IsPickVal( Reporting_Geography__c , "Canada"), Business_Unit__c = "IBG (Core)" )
AND ( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c, NOT( OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed/Booked"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed/Lost") ) ) )

rules.fullName: CATM_Update Total Contract Value with Override
rules.description: Updates Total Contract Value when Override Calc is checked
rules.formula: AND ( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c, Override_Product_Calculations__c = True, ISPICKVAL( Opportunity_Classification__c,'CATM - IBG (Core)') )

rules.fullName: CLONE of%2E%2E%2E CATM_Email Past Due Opportunity Close Date - NABG
rules.description: Email Alert to NABG when Opp Closed date is Past / CATM Past Due Oppty Close Date
rules.formula: AND ( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c, Not(IsClosed), Region__c = 'NABG' , NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName , 'Closing')),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Classification__c , 'CATM - IBG (Core)') )

rules.description: This WFR is used to set Prevent Account Change Retrigger field to false.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( StageName ), NOT( IsClosed ), PRIORVALUE( IsClosed ) )

rules.description: This Work Flow will update Created Date Custom field with apropriate value.
When Opportunity is created, updates the DNB fields required for Credit Application.

criteriaItems.value: 50 Hospitality Account Director,51 Hospitality Account Manager,52 Hospitality Finance Manager

rules.description: For 5X users when opp Forecast Category changes to Closed set the Commitment Risk to Green

rules.fullName: JP Pricing Latest Status Update Date
rules.description: Updates the Date/Time field to current data if status changes,
Recipient receives email when an opportunity with Managed Services revenue has been closed/booked in Salesforce.

rules.fullName: Notify Opportunity Owner and Manager for Value Prompter
rules.formula: AND( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c = false, NOT(ISBLANK(OwnerAssignedDate__c)), NotifyOwnerforValuePrompter__c = true, NotifyOwnerManagerforValuePrompter__c = false, Has_Value_Prompter_Completed__c = FALSE, $Profile.Name <> '50 Hospitality Account Director', $Profile.Name <> '51 Hospitality Account Manager', $Profile.Name <> '51 Hospitality Account Manager-Omitted Pilot', $Profile.Name <> '52 Hospitality Finance Manager', $Profile.Name <> '53 Hospitality Channel Account Manager', $Profile.Name <> '54 Hosted Solutions Sales Operations', $Profile.Name <> '55 Hosted Solutions Sales', $Profile.Name <> 'Cloned 54 Hosted Solutions Sales Operations for DS Admin', $Profile.Name <> '60 DI Product Managers', $Profile.Name <> '62 DI Account Manager', $Profile.Name <> 'Hosp SMB Sales with Hosted', $Profile.Name <> 'HOSP SMB Sales', RecordType.Name = 'Include in Funnel', IsClosed = false, OR( Software_Products__c/CURRENCYRATE('USD')>=250000, Hardware_Products__c/CURRENCYRATE('USD') >=1000000 ) )

rules.fullName: Notify Opportunity Owner for Value Prompter
rules.formula: AND( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c = false, NOT(ISBLANK(OwnerAssignedDate__c)), NotifyOwnerforValuePrompter__c = FALSE, Has_Value_Prompter_Completed__c = FALSE, $Profile.Name <> '50 Hospitality Account Director', $Profile.Name <> '51 Hospitality Account Manager', $Profile.Name <> '51 Hospitality Account Manager-Omitted Pilot', $Profile.Name <> '52 Hospitality Finance Manager', $Profile.Name <> '53 Hospitality Channel Account Manager', $Profile.Name <> '54 Hosted Solutions Sales Operations', $Profile.Name <> '55 Hosted Solutions Sales', $Profile.Name <> 'Cloned 54 Hosted Solutions Sales Operations for DS Admin', $Profile.Name <> '60 DI Product Managers', $Profile.Name <> '62 DI Account Manager', $Profile.Name <> 'Hosp SMB Sales with Hosted', $Profile.Name <> 'HOSP SMB Sales', RecordType.Name = 'Include in Funnel', IsClosed = false, OR( Software_Products__c/CURRENCYRATE('USD')>=250000, Hardware_Products__c/CURRENCYRATE('USD') >=1000000 ) )

rules.description: EBA_SF-1254 - Notify Payments Specialist when they are added to an opportunity

criteriaItems.value: Premier Solution Provider,Dealer,Authorized Solution Provider,Independent Software Vendor,Managed Services Provider,Distributor,Advanced Solution Provider,Systems Integrator

rules.description: Create workflow so that the Fulfilled by Partner box is TRUE if the account name is an active partner.
This is time-based workflow rule that will automatically search the database daily, and sends email to Opportunity Owner after 1 day and adding Opportunity Owner Manager after 8 days.
rules.formula: AND( NOT($Setup.Automation_Setting__c.Skip_Flow__c), CATM_Record__c = false, IsClosed = false, NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName,'IPS Base Business')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Industry__c,'Retail')) )

rules.description: This workflow is the part of the Salespath Component.

rules.fullName: Send email to Chad Bruhn when new customer opportunity is Closed%2FBooked

criteriaItems.value: Indirect - Include in Funnel Distributor,Indirect - Include in Funnel Reseller,Include in Funnel

rules.fullName: Send email to DI CAs when an opportunity is placed in the Closed%2FBooked status%2E
Send email to John Morgan when an opportunity is Closed

criteriaItems.value: Indirect - Include in Funnel Distributor,Indirect - Include in Funnel Reseller,Include in Funnel,Indirect - Exclude from Funnel,Indirect - Include in Funnel Distributor,Indirect - Include in Funnel Reseller,Exclude from Funnel,Include in Funnel

rules.fullName: Send email to Mariana Miranda when Banking opportunity is Closed%2FBooked

criteriaItems.value: Indirect - Include in Funnel Distributor,Indirect - Include in Funnel Reseller,Include in Funnel

rules.fullName: Send email to Ron Furnier when an opportunity is Closed

criteriaItems.value: Indirect - Exclude from Funnel,Indirect - Include in Funnel Distributor,Indirect - Include in Funnel Reseller,Exclude from Funnel,Include in Funnel
Benjamin Seelos,Brian Pilla,Mark Leinenkugel,John Morgan,Bo Watson,Robert Malik

rules.fullName: Set Previous Forecast On Closing Modal
rules.formula: OR( AND(ISCHANGED( Forecast_Category__c ),IsClosed , OR(RecordTypeId ='012700000001PoZ',RecordTypeId ='0120g000000YU9x', RecordTypeId ='0120g000000N2y2') ), AND(IsClosed , OR(RecordTypeId = '012700000001PoU',RecordTypeId = '0120g000000N2y1' )))

rules.description: Track the closed Date
rules.formula: OR( AND ( CPQ__c, ($Profile.Name <> "02 NSC Administrator"), ($Profile.Name <> "C9 Administration"), ($Profile.Name <> "iPaas Administration"), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed/Booked'), ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed/Lost'), ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed/Discontinued'), ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed/Booked - NonFunnel')) , (Prevent_Account_Change_Retrigger__c = false)) , AND ( NOT(CPQ__c), ($Profile.Name <> "02 NSC Administrator"), ($Profile.Name <> "C9 Administration"), ($Profile.Name <> "iPaas Administration"), ($Profile.Name <> "Soup Integration"), ($Profile.Name <> "04 NSC UI Administrator"), IF($Permission.Update_Closed_Opp_for_7_days,today()-CloseDate>= VALUE($Label.Opp_Grace_Sales_Rep)+1 , IF($Permission.Update_Closed_Opp_for_37_days ,today()-CloseDate>=VALUE($Label.Opp_Grace_Sales_Ops)+1,true) ) , OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed/Booked'), ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed/Lost'), ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed/Discontinued'), ISPICKVAL( StageName, 'Closed/Booked - NonFunnel')) , (Prevent_Account_Change_Retrigger__c = false)) )

rules.fullName: Update User Modified date on Opportunity
rules.description: This workflow updates the User Modified Date field on Opportunity, based on Access Type of Current User.

rules.fullName: When the Sales Program value %3D Hospitality Cross-Selling%2C trigger an email notification to opportunity creator%2E
rules.description: When the Sales Program value = Hospitality Cross-Selling, trigger an email notification to opportunity creator.

rules.fullName: notify TESCO account owner of CTS
rules.description: This workflow rule will send an email alert to the account owner anytime an opportunity is created under one of the TESCO MCN's.

tasks.description: You have an opportunity that is 7 days past the Expected Book Date. Please review this opportunity and update the Expected Book Date, Expected Delivery Date, and the Product Schedule.
tasks.subject: Action Required: Past Due Opportunity
New Business - please call site to kick start the deployment process
Please contact site to determine why we lost the customer
Renewal w/ exchange - please call site to kick start the deployment process
Send the merchant a thank you letter. Once you complete close this task
Send the merchant a welcome pack. Once you complete close this task
